config.json-schema-plus.title: Schema Plus Configuration
config.json-schema-plus.schemas.descript:
[abgox.json-schema-plus](https://json-schema-plus.abgox.com)
- Provides multilingual dynamic schema matching for JSON Schema.
- It allows defining different schema architectures for various language environments via `urls`.
config.json-schema-plus.schemas.fileMatc:
- File path patterns to match JSON files.
- Supports [glob syntax](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/glob-patterns).
config.json-schema-plus.schemas.url: Load this default schema if no matching schema is found in `urls`.
config.json-schema-plus.schemas.urls:
Schema architectures for different languages.
- Automatically loads the appropriate schema based on the current locale.
- Falls back to the default schema defined in `url` if no match is found in `urls`.
config.json-schema-plus.schemas.urls.url:
Schema architecture
- Can be a local file path or a remote URL.
- Here are some examples:

  ```json
  "url": "schema/scoop-manifest.en-US.json"
  ```
  ```json
  "url": "https://schema.abgox.com/scoop-manifest.en-US.json"
  ```
